content.raw:
I am trying to test the latest docker images \(downloaded today\) and run

‌

```
./run.bash osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:cloudsim_sim_latest cloudsim_sim.ign worldName:=simple_urban_01 robotName1:=X0F10L robotConfig1:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_4
```

plus

‌

```
 ./run.bash osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:cloudsim_bridge_latest worldName:=simple_urban_01 robotName1:=X0F10L robotConfig1:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_4
```

but it looks like the robot is not properly placed?

‌

```
[ERROR] [1572897313.003933339, 20.780000000]: Failed to call pose_from_artifact_origin service, robot may not exist, be outside staging area, or the service is not available.
Origin ERROR received
```

Note, that the latest version on AWS works fine
